Articles.Content: Has any one triedcrashing another ship into the mun arch? It just looks cracked like you could break more off....

Unfortunately, the Mun arch is a static, non-destructible object, which model is hard-coded iirc, so it's not possible to destroy it.

The question has been asked several times, people have tried, and the results are pretty straightforwards - you can't.
Moved from S&S to KSP 1 Discussion (I'm assuming KSP 1)
